title: The Best Song Japanese Breakfast Says She's Written Is For A Video Game
description: Michelle Zauner is best known as the frontwoman of indie rock band Japanese Breakfast and like most musicians, she's trying to tell a personal story through her music. But she's spent the last couple of years composing music that has nothing to do with her — for a video game soundtrack.
copyright: Copyright 2020-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: The Best Song Japanese Breakfast Says She's Written Is For A Video Game
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Japanese Breakfast tried to create a soundtrack people would never get tired of hearing during hours of gameplay and would connect them to the main character's journey.
itunes:subtitle: Japanese Breakfast tried to create a soundtrack people would never get tired of hearing during hours of gameplay and would connect them to the main character's journey.
